00024 using namespace izenelib::util;

00028 // Convenience definition
00029 #ifndef byte
00030 typedef unsigned char byte;
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 namespace util{
00039 class DbObj : public RefCount<NullLock>
00040 //boost::enable_shared_from_this<DbObj>
00041 {
00042 public:
00046         DbObj(void) {
00047                 _data = 0;
00048                 _size = 0;
00049         }
00050 
00054         DbObj(void* pd, size_t sz) {
00055                 _size = sz;
00056                 if (_size != 0) {
00057                         _data = new byte[_size];
00058                         memcpy(_data, pd, _size);
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00065         DbObj(const std::string& s) {
00066                 _size = s.length();
00067                 _data = new byte[_size];
00068                 memcpy(_data, s.c_str(), _size);
00069         }
00070 
00074         DbObj(const char* ps, size_t sz = 0) {
00075                 _size = (0 == sz) ? strlen(ps) : sz;
00076                 _data = new byte[_size];
00077                 memcpy(_data, ps, _size);
00078         }
00079 
00083         DbObj(unsigned long ul) {
00084                 _size = sizeof(unsigned long);
00085                 _data = new byte[_size];
00086                 *((unsigned long*)_data) = ul;
00087         }
00088 
00092         DbObj(long l) {
00093                 _size = sizeof(long);
00094                 _data = new byte[_size];
00095                 *((long*)_data) = l;
00096         }
00097 
00101         DbObj(unsigned short us) {
00102                 _size = sizeof(unsigned short);
00103                 _data = new byte[_size];
00104                 *((unsigned short*)_data) = us;
00105         }
00106 
00110         DbObj(short s) {
00111                 _size = sizeof(short);
00112                 _data = new byte[_size];
00113                 *((short*)_data) = s;
00114         }
00115 
00119         DbObj(DbObj& obj) {
00120                 _data = 0;
00121                 _size = 0;
00122                 operator=(obj);
00123         }
00124 
00128         ~DbObj() {              
00129                 if (_size != 0) {
00130                         delete[] _data;
00131                         _data = 0;
00132                         _size = 0;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 
00139         DbObj& operator=(DbObj& obj) {
00140                 if (_size != 0) {
00141                         delete[] _data;
00142                 }
00143                 if (obj._size > 0) {
00144                         _size = obj._size;
00145                         _data = new byte[_size];
00146                         memcpy(_data, obj._data, _size);
00147                 }
00148                 return *this;
00149         }
00150 
00151         bool operator <=(DbObj& obj) {
00152                 return memcmp(_data, obj.getData(), min(_size, obj.getSize()));
00153 
00154         }
00155 
00156 public:
00157 
00158         const void* getData() const {
00159                 return _data;
00160         }
00161         size_t getSize() const {
00162                 return _size;
00163         }
00164         /*
00165          *      we can set any type of data. By this, we can deal with different KeyType and DataType.
00166          * 
00167          */
00168 
00169         void setData(const void* pd, size_t sz) {
00170                 if (_size) {
00171                         delete[] _data;
00172                 }
00173                 _size = sz;
00174                 _data = new byte[_size];
00175                 memcpy(_data, pd, _size);
00176         }
00177 
00178         /*
00179          *      for debug.
00180          */
00181 
00182         void display() {
00183                 cout<<"\nDbObj display..\n";
00184                 cout<<"_size "<<_size<<endl;
00185                 cout<<"_data "<<(char*)_data<<endl;
00186         }
00187 
00188 
00189 private:
00190         byte* _data;
00191         size_t _size;
00192 };
00193 
00194 typedef intrusive_ptr<DbObj> DbObjPtr;
00195 typedef std::vector<DbObjPtr> DBOBJVECTOR;
00196 typedef std::list<DbObjPtr> DBOBJLIST;

00198 }//end of namespace util
